attributes.action: Ignore all other petitions about DLA, and make it harder to qualify.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do you "the taxpayer" like giving money away, more than £130 a month. :)

Save the taxpayers money and stop giving DLA to those who dont deserve it.

Who is finding the recession hardest?  The taxpayer!!!  We make the majority.  Make the right choice.

Dont give luxury cars to those who dont pay.  Be green, give them a cheap, fuel efficient car.  India is producing cars for less than £1300.  Have big DLA stickers on the side of the cars.  Let them not drive in pride.  No more £10,000+ cars.

Make it harder to qualify for DLA.  There are simply too many healthy looking claimants.

One more thing.  Means based testing.  Make them work!!!

Give people who DESERVE DLA the extra money they require.

Thank you taxpayers.
